Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Financial/Business
Status: Returning Series
Network: CBC ( Canada)
Airs: Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: March 12, 2012

In the wake of a destructive recession, companies across the country are struggling to keep their companies and their futures afloat. The Big Decision features two Canadian businesses desperately in need of expert advice and a cash injection. Entrepreneurial icons Jim Treliving and Arlene Dickinson want to help. If the companies can rise to the challenge of changing their ways, they could be given a life-changing investment from two of the most revered business leaders in the country.
(Source: CBC)

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31134)
